Package index

Estimation

Functions to estimate RsienaTwoStep models.

ts_estim() ts_targets() ts_phase1() ts_phase3()
Estimation of parameters via Robbins-Monro algorithm

ABM

Functions to run the ABM-ministep or ABM-twostep simulations.

ts_alternatives_ministep() ts_alternatives_simstep() ts_alternatives_twostep() ts_alternative()
Possible networks after ministep, simstep or twostep
ts_alternatives_ministep_beh() ts_alternatives_simstep_beh() ts_alternatives_twostep_beh()
Possible behavior after ministep, simstep or twostep
ts_select()
Select actor(s)
ts_sims() ts_sim()
Simulation of Network evolution

Network statistics

Functions to calculate the network statistics and total evaluation.

ts_eval()
Evaluation function
ts_degree() ts_recip() ts_outAct() ts_inAct() ts_outPop() ts_inPop() ts_transTrip() ts_transMedTrip() ts_transRecTrip() ts_cycle3() ts_egoX() ts_altX() ts_diffX() ts_simX() ts_absDiffX() ts_sameX() ts_egoXaltX()
Network Statistics
ts_linear() ts_quad() ts_avAlt() ts_effFrom()
Behavior Statistics
